0.author: Lippman,David
0.description: Payroll 1. taxes, combo wage b/t FUTA and SUTA limits
0.control:
$abstolerance = .01
$scoremethod = "acct"
$hidetips = true
$noshuffle = "all"
loadlibrary("acct")

$paysofar = rrand(6100,6700,100)
$paysofarp = prettyint($paysofar)
$payjune =  rrand(1020,1300,20)   //needs to add over 7000 but under 8000
$payjunep = prettyint($payjune)

$allow = rand(1,3)
$wordallow = numtowords($allow)
$wordallow .= ' allowance' if ($allow==1)
$wordallow .= ' allowances' if ($allow>1)

$with = 114 + 3*($payjune-1100)/20 if ($allow==1)
$with = 92 + 3*($payjune-1100)/20 if ($allow==2)
$with = 69 + 3*($payjune-1100)/20 if ($allow==3)
$ficass = .062*$payjune
$ficamed = .0145*$payjune

$taxtable = formpopup('IRS tax table (click to pop open)','https://s3.amazonaws.com/myopenmath/ufiles/1/taxtable1.html',800,500,"link",true)

$tacol1 = array("Gross Pay","Federal Withholding","FICA-SS","FICA-Medicare"," Net Pay")
$tacol2 = array($payjune, $with, $ficass, $ficamed , $payjune - $with - $ficass - $ficamed )
$ta = makeaccttable2(array(),array(false,true),array(),array($tacol1, $tacol2), 0, $anstypes, $answer, $showanswer, $displayformat, $answerformat, $answerboxsize)

$ops = array("FICA-SS Payable", "FICA-Medicare Payable", "FUTA Taxes Payable","SUTA Taxes Payable", "Salaries Expense", "Federal Withholding Payable", "Salaries Payable", "Payroll Tax Expense")

$jb['date'] = '06/30'
$jb['debits'] = array("Salaries Expense", $payjune)
$jb['credits'] = array("Federal Withholding Payable", $with, "FICA-SS Payable", $ficass, "FICA-Medicare Payable", $ficamed, "Salaries Payable", $payjune - $with - $ficass - $ficamed)
$jb['note'] = "to accrue salaries and withholding for June payroll"

$jeb = makejournal($jb, 5, $ops, $anstypes, $questions, $answer, $showanswer, $displayformat, $answerboxsize)
$answer = scorejournal($stuanswers[$thisq], $answer, $jb, 5)

$FUTA = (7000 - $paysofar)*.008
$SUTA = $payjune*.023
$tccol1 = array("FICA","Medicare","FUTA","SUTA"," Total ER taxes")
$tccol2 = array($ficass, $ficamed, $FUTA, $SUTA , $ficass + $ficamed + $FUTA + $SUTA )
$tc = makeaccttable2(array(),array(false,true),array(),array($tccol1, $tccol2), 20, $anstypes, $answer, $showanswer, $displayformat, $answerformat, $answerboxsize)

$jd['date'] = '06/30'
$jd['debits'] = array("Payroll Tax Expense", $ficass + $ficamed + $FUTA + $SUTA)
$jd['credits'] = array("FICA-SS Payable", $ficass, "FICA-Medicare Payable", $ficamed, "FUTA Taxes Payable", $FUTA, "SUTA Taxes Payable", $SUTA)
$jd['note'] = "to record employer's portion of payroll taxes for June"

$jed = makejournal($jd, 25, $ops, $anstypes, $questions, $answer, $showanswer, $displayformat, $answerboxsize)
$answer = scorejournal($stuanswers[$thisq], $answer, $jd, 25)
0.qtext:
Zion, Inc. has one employee who has worked January - June of the current year. The employee is single, paid weekly, and claims $wordallow on her W-2. The company is in a state that has no state income taxes. The FICA Social Security tax rate is 6.2% on the first $110,800 of wages and the FICA Medicare tax rate is 1.45% on all wages. Zion, Inc.'s FUTA tax rate is 0.8% on the first $7,000 of wages and their SUTA tax rate is 2.3% on the first $8,000 of wages.

The employee's earnings thus far are as follows:

Gross pay Jan - May   Gross pay for June
$$paysofarp $$payjunep

 a) Use the information above and the $taxtable to calculate all of the taxes that should be withheld from the employees paycheck and her net pay for June.  Round values to 2 decimal places if needed.

$ta

b) Prepare the journal entry Zion, Inc. will record to accrue the June wages for this employee.

$jeb

c) Use the information provided to calculate the payroll taxes that Zion must pay on the employee's behalf for the month of June

$tc

d) Prepare the journal entry Zion, Inc. will use to record their portion of the payroll taxes for June.

$jed

2.author: Benoit,Jason

1.author: Benoit,Jason
